title: Sends an email with a key to reset the password.

400.description: No account with that email address exists.

403.description: Other email to reset password was sent recently.

title: Returns all the registered login plugins.
name: GetLoginPlugins

title: Sets a new password in the user with token.
name: Reset

401.description: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.

title: Proxy everything that goes after :prefix to the application registered with the given prefix.
name: Proxy

Parameter.description: The unique prefix of a previously registered application.
Relevant for the API this request will be forwarded to. The target API will receive this route.

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
Asuming we already have a registered application with the following data:

    prefix: gleaner
    host: localhost:3300
    name: Gleaner App.

Given the following request GET /api/gleaner/traces/:traceId where:

    gleaner is the prefix for the Gleaner App.
    /traces/:traceId is the extracted route from the request.

This request will be forwarded to the following address:

    http://localhost:3300/traces:traceId

with...

{
    ...data relevant to the parameter that goes after prefix...
}
